titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a goodly treatyse, and it is called, A notable lesson, otherwyse it is called The golden pystle
titleStmt.author: Whitford, Richard, fl. 1495-1555?
Bernard, of Clairvaux, Saint, 1090 or 91-1153. Epistola de perfectione vitae.

publicationStmt.publisher: Impry[n]ted by me Wynkyn de Worde, dwellynge in London, in Flete strete, at the sygne of the Sonne,
publicationStmt.date: the xxiii daye of Noue[m]ber, in [the] yere of our Lorde God, M.CCCCC. and xxx. [23 Nov. 1530]

notesStmt.note: "This was brought vnto me in Englysshe of an olde translacyon rugh, and rude, and requyred to amende it. I thought lesse labour to wryte newe the whole ..." signed: Rycharde Whytforde--P. [7].
An adaptation, by Richard Whitford, of Bernard's Epistola de perfectione vitae--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Exeter College (University of Oxford). Library (reel 1762:25), and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2248:5).
